mapper.delete: delete from item where item_seq = #{itemSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and category_seq = #{categorySeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert: insert into item (item_seq, category_seq, item_name, item_price, item_regdate, item_fwdate, item_desc, item_maker, item_img) values ((select seq from (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(item_seq), 0) + 1 as seq from item where category_seq = #{categorySeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) tmp), #{categorySeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemRegdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{itemFwdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{itemDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemMaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemImg,jdbcType=BLOB})
mapper.update: update item set category_seq = #{categorySeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_price = #{itemPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, item_regdate = #{itemRegdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, item_fwdate = #{itemFwdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, item_desc = #{itemDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_maker = #{itemMaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_img = #{itemImg,jdbcType=BLOB} where item_seq = #{itemSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM item WHERE category_seq = #{categorySeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
